Sanya Private Investigator

Asia Investigation / China Investigator provides investigation in Sanya, for our attorney, business, insurance company and individual clients. We provide factory checks, background checks, due diligence, interviews, inspections, cheating spouse investigations and other types of investigation.

Please contact us regarding your investigation case in Sanya. We will recommend a strategy that fits your budget and provides the answers you need. Contact us for a Free Consultation

Information about Sanya

The result of Sanya River (the ancient name Linchuan water) have something 2 Sanya River rendezvous point, as “Ah”-shaped, so called “Sanya.” Sanya east Lingshui County , west Ledong County , North adjoin Baoting County , south of the South China Sea . The total land area of 1919 square kilometers, the total sea area of 6,000 square kilometers, population 690,000, is a Li, Miao, Hui and Han multi-ethnic areas.
